name: Antique Cuirass
description: Unique Passive - Deter: When attacked by an enemy hero's skill, reduces their Physical ATK by 8% for 2s (up to 3 stacks).

name: Athena's Shield
description: Unique Passive - Shield: Can be triggered when taking Magic Damage. Reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 5s (including the Magic Damage that triggers this effect). You will be able to trigger this effect again only after leaving combat for 10s.

name: Berserker's Fury
description:
Unique Attribute: +40% Crit Damage
Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2 seconds

name: Blade Armor
description:
Unique Attribute: +20% Crit Damage Reduction
Unique Passive - Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage) plus 25% of the hero's Physical Defense to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.

name: Blade of Despair
description: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2 seconds (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

name: Blade of the Heptaseas
description:
Unique Attribute: +15 Physical PEN
Unique Passive - Ambush: If no damage is dealt or taken from enemy heroes within 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack deals 160 (40% Total Physical ATK) as extra Physical Damage and slows the target by [40% for 1.5 seconds].

name: Blood Wings
description: Unique Passive - Guard: Gain a Shield equal to 200% Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 20s after being damaged and grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts.

name: Bloodlust Axe
description: Unique Attribute: +20% Spell Vamp

name: Brute Force Breastplate
description: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 2%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Clock of Destiny
description:
Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.
Unique Passive - Reincarnate: Gains 5% extra Magic Power and 600 extra Max Mana at max Time stacks.

name: Concentrated Energy
description:
Unique Attribute: +20% Spell Vamp
Unique Passive - Recharge: Dealing magic damage increases magic power by 5s (can gain 1 stacks per second, and up to 6 stacks total). When reaching full stacks, increases magic damage by 12% for 3s.

name: Corrosion Scythe
description:
Unique Passive - Corrosive: Each time a Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, gains additional 80 Physical Damage and reduces the target's Movement Speed by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacking up to 5 times.
Unique Passive - Impulse: When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.
stats:
+30 Physical ATK
+35% Attack Speed
+5% Movement SPD

name: Cursed Helmet
description: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 100% against minions.

name: Demon Hunter Sword
description:
Unique Passive - Devour: Basic attacks will deal 8% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive - Devour: Each Basic Attack grants 3% Lifesteal for 3s. Stack up to 5 times.

name: Demon Shoes
description: Unique Passive - Mysticism: Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero’s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero’s mana.

name: Divine Glaive
description:
Unique Attribute: +40% Magic PEN
Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: Each point of the enemy's Magic Defense increases Magic Penetration by 0.1% when dealing damage to it, capped at 20%.

name: Dominance Ice
description:
Unique Passive - Artic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 70% of normal.
Unique Passive - Lifebane: Reduce the shield Shield and HP Regen effects of nearby enemy heroes to 50% of normal.

name: Enchanted Talisman
description:
Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% of Max Mana every 10s in total.
Unique Passive - Magic Mastery: Max CD Reduction increased by 5%.

name: Endless Battle
description:
Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5 seconds cooldown).
Unique Passive - Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
stats:
+65 Physical ATK
+250 HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5% Mana Regen

name: Feather of Heaven
description:
Unique Passive - Affliction: Basic Attacks deal extra Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 30% Magic Power.
Unique Passive - Impulse: When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.
stats:
+20% Attack Speed
+55 Magic Power
+10% Lifesteal
+5% CD Reduction

name: Flask of the Oasis
description:
Unique Attribute: +12% Healing Effect
Unique Passive - Blessing: After casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below or falls below 35% within 5s, they will gain a 100-1500 shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s. This effect can only trigger once every 40s on the same target.

name: Fleeting Time
description: Unique Passive - Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

name: Genius Wand
description:
Unique Attribute: +10 Magic PEN
Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 2~9 for 2s (the Defense reduction scales with level). Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Glowing Wand
description: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn the targets for 3 seconds, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing Magic Damage taken by 2–4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

name: Golden Staff
description:
Unique Passive - Swift: Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
Unique Passive - Endless Strike: After every 2 non-critical Basic Attacks. Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 100% and its effects is triggered an extra 2 time(s).

name: Great Dragon Spear
description: Unique Passive - Supreme Warrior: After casting an Ultimate, increase Movement Speed by 15% for 7.5s This effect has a 15s cooldown
stats:
+70 Physical ATK
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+20% Crit Chance

name: Guardian Helmet
description: Unique Passive - Recovery: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

name: Haas's Claws
description:
Unique Attribute: +25% Lifesteal
Unique Passive - Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 20% extra Attack Speed for 2 seconds.
stats:
+30 Physical ATK
+20% Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance

name: Holy Crystal
description: Unique Passive - Mystery: Increases Magic Power by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

name: Hunter Strike
description:
Unique Attribute: +15 Physical PEN
Unique Passive - Retribution: Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 50% that decays rapidly over 3s. This effect has 8s cooldown.

name: Ice Queen Wand
description: Unique Passive - Ice Bound: Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.
stats:
+300 HP
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+7% Movement SPD

name: Immortality
description: Unique Passive - Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and gets 16% Max HP and 220-1200 shield that lasts for 3s. (Scales with level) This effect has a CD of 210s.

name: Lightning Truncheon
description: Unique Passive - Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill deals 50-1000 Magic Damage (scales with Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies.

name: Malefic Roar
description:
Unique Attribute: +20% Physical Penetration
Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.125% extra Physical Penetration to each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 40%.

name: Necklace of Durance
description:
Unique Passive - Gift: Regens 20% HP and Mana within 2s of leveling up.
Unique Passive - Lifebane: Upon dealing damage to the target, reduces Shield and HP Regen of the target by 50% for 3s.
stats:
+60 Magic Power
+300 HP
+380 Mana
+5% CD Reduction

name: Oracle
description: Unique Passive - Bless: Raise shield absorption and HP regen effect by 30%.

name: Queen's Wings
description: Unique Passive - Demonize: Reduces damage taken by 20% when health is less than 40% and increases your Spell Vamp by 35% for 5s. This effect has a cooldown of 60s.

name: Radiant Armor
description: Unique Passive - Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5-8 Magic Damage Reductions (scales with level) for 3s, capped at 6 stacks.

name: Rapid Boots
description: Unique Passive - Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.

name: Rose Gold Meteor
description: Unique Passive - Lifeline: When HP is about to drop below 30%, gains a 840~1820 shield (scales with level) and Increase Movement Speed by 50% when triggered, the effect decays over 3 seconds. Cooldown: 60s.

name: Sea Halberd
description:
Unique Passive - Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3 seconds.
Unique Passive - Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.

name: Starlium Scythe
description: Unique Passive - Crisis: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 100% Magic Power as extra True Damage and grants 10% extra Movement Speed. (1.5 seconds cooldown).
stats:
+70 Magic Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+6 Mana Regen

name: Thunder Belt
description: Unique Passive - Thunderbolt: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will deal True Damage as much as 50 plus 5% of the caster's Extra Max HP to the enemy target and surrounding units and slow them by 40-80% (increases with the caster's Extra Max HP) for 1s. This effect has a 1.5s cooldown.
stats:
+800 HP
+40 Physical Defense
+30 Mana Regen
+10% CD Reduction

name: Tough Boots
description: Unique Passive - Fortitude: Reduces time controlled 30%.

name: Twilight Armor
description: Unique Passive - Twilight: When taking more than 600 damage in a single hit, the excess amount will be reduced by 150 + 15% of Max HP. Cooldown: 5s.

name: War Axe
description: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Enter a battle stance upon dealing damage to any enemy unit. This increases the hero's Physical Attack by 9 and Physical Penetration by 3 each second for 3s, to a max of 8 stacks (Marksmen/Mages/Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects); also grants 15% Movement Speed at full stacks.

name: Warrior Boots
description: Unique Passive - Valor: Physical Defense will be increased by 5 for 25s for each basic attack received, capped at 25.

name: Wind of Nature
description: Unique Active - Wind Chant: Immune to all Physical Damage. Last 2s. (Duration becomes half when used by non-marksmen). CD 70s.

name: Windtalker
description:
Unique Passive - Typhoon: Every 5–2 seconds (reduced by 0.2 seconds for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150–362 Magic Damage. (This attack can critically strike and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
Unique Passive - Activate: Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased [by] 5% for a short time.
stats:
+40% Attack Speed
+20 Movement Speed
+10% Crit Chance

name: Winter Truncheon
description: Unique Active - Frozen: Freeze upon using. The hero can't do anything but will be immune to all DMG and debuff. Last 2s, CD 100s.
